title: Eddie Bauer - Twin Quilt Set, Cotton Reversible Bedding with Matching Sham, Medium Weight Home Decor (Boulder Grey, Twin)
features: MATERIAL: 100% Cotton Construction- featuring natural fibers crafted to be ultra soft and breathable
SET INCLUDES: One quilt and one standard sham

FEATURES: Quilt features a cotton/polyester blended fill; Quilt features a tonal twill grey print reverse; Eddie Bauer is committed to cutting back on wasteful packaging- In our mission to cut out plastic, this product comes neatly packaged and secured with a ribbon
DIMENSIONS: Quilt- 88"L x 68"W; Standard Sham- 21"L x 27"W
CARE: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low; Prewashed for added softness
description: Spruce up your bedroom with the classic plaid Eddie Bauer Boulder Plaid Quilt Set, in modern shades of grey and white. Overlaid printed textures create the visual effect of a weave, adding depth and additional interest to this iconic design. A unique quilt stitch mixes channel and diagonal stitching as a subtle counterpoint to the straight geometry of the plaid. The quilt reverses to a tonal twill print in grey that also trims the edges of the quilt and shams. Made from 100% cotton and pre-washed for added softness, the quilt set is breathable and durable, for ultimate comfort. Filled with a blend of 80% cotton and 20% polyester, Eddie Bauer quilts are lightweight but warm, perfect for use as a layering piece in your bedding. Ensemble is machine washable for easy care.
